title: FIB: Implement Change Log, Usability Features
description:
Business Scope:
As a user of the FIB tool I want to see which updates have been done since I last used the Tool.
acceptance_criteria: A Change Log is implemented on basis of the filters that the user can use to see updated in FTTH status
Exchange downloadable Excel to finalized version
Handle uploadable Excel for finalized version
Adjust handling of additional address fields to be editable after KLS ID is added to a location
